posts.title: drug wars announcementä¸­æ–‡å¯¼è¯»æµ…æ
posts.text: Your awaiting announcement.åˆ†é…è°ƒæ•´ï¼šæ¯æ—¥å¥–é‡‘å’Œé“¶è¡ŒæŠ¢åŠ«å„å 3%ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯æ¨åŠ¨æˆ˜äº‰å’ŒæŠ‘åˆ¶æ¸¸æˆå†…é€šè´§è†¨èƒ€ã€‚You could have noticed a change in the reward adjustment and it goes like this 3% for the daily prize and 3% for the Heist (except for the sunday event). It wasnâ€™t an easy choice on our side, but it is the option that is leading the game for a better development. With an equal distribution percentage it will result in a better inflation control. We are aware that with this change players will probably see the game in a different way, and maybe itâ€™s for the best. We hope that with this revision, the players will think again about their gaming tactics and mature it as the game matures as well. Weâ€™ve seen this word â€œPonziâ€ related to Drugwars but with this adjustment in the reward mechanism, we are changing the deal and we wonâ€™t let players giving a false impression to newcomers as how it used to be this past 2 weeks. We donâ€™t see Drugwars as a game you play one or two weeks, but we want it to be something you would spend lots of time on (for free or not), and be part of the community of Drug Lords. Back to the root.We started Drugwars with â€œGet paid to rule your worldâ€ as we wanted something strong, something powerful, something impactful, but it was too directed towards money while Drugwars is a game. Few days ago we decided to switch for â€œThe drugs and the guns are virtual but the money is realâ€. Agree, it is still a strong one with a slight reference to money. Obviously you are still going to say that the slogan is still about money and investment, but hey, have you noticed that everyday you are waiting for the midnight event aka the daily prize and heist? Itâ€™s a special feature on Drugwars and it has the right to be mentioned in the slogan. But we reduced its impact so that new players wonâ€™t be confused about the fact that itâ€™s a game. Whatâ€™s next?æˆ˜äº‰çœŸçš„è¦æ¥äº†ï¼Œä¸€å‘¨ä¹‹å†…ä¼šæ¨å‡ºæˆ˜äº‰æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œä¸€äº›å¤§ä½¬æˆ˜åŠ›å·²ç»å¾ˆææ€–äº†ï¼Œå¦‚ï¼šNGC would raid you with his 84228 attack and 58176 defense;Broncnutz would sweep you with his 46671 attack and 23780 defense;Encrypt3dbrok3r would murder your production with his 54576 attack and 27988 defense.æ‰€ä»¥ä¸ç®¡æ€ä¹ˆæ ·åœ¨æŠ“ç´§å»ºæˆ¿å­çš„æ—¶å€™ä¹ŸæŠ½ç©ºæ‹›äº›å†›é˜Ÿå§ï¼ As we said, Drugwars is in it early access stage which is why modifications can be made any time. Still no modifications are made to hurt the players, itâ€™s all about improving the game day by day and preparing its future. Soon, Battles will be available and it will be the time to steal, rob, raid, betray for ressources. ç„¶åæ˜¯å¸®æ´¾ å¸®æ´¾ç›¸å…³çš„æ¸¸æˆå†…å®¹ä¹Ÿä¼šå¾ˆä¸°å¯Œï¼Œæœ‰å¸®æ´¾ä»»åŠ¡ã€å¸®æ´¾æ’è¡Œæ¦œã€è¿˜ä¼šæœ‰æ€ªç‰©æ”»åŸâ€¦â€¦ Gangs will be introduced in a cool way. Then Missions will be available which will provide rewards for the accomplishment. Gang Missions and Gangs Leaderboard will be opened as well as the introduction of Gang Rewards. The apparition of unique and legendary units/items (with a system like in Diablo) to make your empire incomparable to any others. Search Warrant as a way to reward the most courageous one and a way to control the feared ones. A bounty system to put a contract on your enemy; and many other cool features which will add a lot of fun to the game. ç§»åŠ¨APPè¦æ¥äº†ï¼Œç›´æ¥å¯ä»¥åœ¨APP storeä¸‹è½½ï¼Œéšæ—¶ã€éšåœ°å¯ç©ï¼ Thatâ€™s it, mobile friendly you said? Hell no, we are putting Drugwars in your pocket very soon. Take Drugwars everywhere, anywhere, on your travel, on your family dinner, on your deal, etc. The app will be available on the apple store and the playstore after the v0.3.0. Out of sight development.We said earlier that behind-the-scene itâ€™s hectic, like mega hectic. We are not only developing the game everyday that you can see on the platform but we are also working on the background, marketing and financial side of the game. We are looking for different revenue stream and fortunately for us, we have different choices coming to us. On top of that, we are working on a new fictional â€œcryptocurrencyâ€ that will be implemented in the game as THE Drugwars currency. We are still brainstorming, debating, and adjusting it. posts.title: How to play the new version of Drugwars?
posts.text: How to play the new version of Drugwars? There are lots of changes between the new version of Drugwarsand the old version from the page display, most of the friends prefer the original old version. The main content update includes the official start of the war and bootcamp units. Rules of war: 1. resource : All resources, including drugs, weapons, andALCOHOLS, will be robbed.The storage is now protecting 25% of your resources. That should make you more comfortable.In result the attackers can steal a maximum of 30% of the 75% which are not safe. 2. Protection mechanism: After suffering a defeat, a 12 hours shield will be automatically activated, but it will disappeared once you attack another player within the 12 hours. if you are the offensive party, even if you fail in the battle,you can not get the12 hours of protection rights. 3. Bootcamp units: In the very near future the Army that will leave for the war will be limited to 200 population(200 population rule is not applied yet. You may be attacked with as many units as possible); The bootcamp units and resource requirements have changed; nine new types of combatants have been added, including high-attack and high-defense personnel. Recent personal game suggestions: 1. Look more and do less. After all, the war mode has just started, everyone is exploring and growing up in battle. There was once a player who rushed out without knowing his opponent. As a result, the two sides fought hard and ended up with a tragic victory. Sadly, he did not grab any resources and lost nearly 200 steem worth of combatants. 2. Grab the bank to earn steem. During the period of familiarity with the rules and the stability rules of the game organizers, it is recommended to grab a bank every 4 hours to use the drugs. 3. Recruit combatants. if you do not want to grab others, it is recommended to use defensive and offensive matches, personal preference for Big mama (high defense) and Bazooka Guy (high attack) 1:3 . After guaranteeing your own safety (in your storage there are only 100 drugs to be grabbed,and you have combatants of equivalent value to 5 steem in defense, others will not risk the 5 steem combatants to grab your 100drugs resources) ,Return to normal construction, and gradually recruit attack and defense high combat units, such as MERCENARY (attack 120, defense 75). All pictures from @drugwars. Posted from my blog with SteemPress : http://cnstm.org/blog/2019/03/05/how-to-play-the-new-version-of-drugwars/ Sponsored ( Powered by dclick ) This page is synchronized from the post: How to play the new version of Drugwars? document.querySelectorAll('.not-gallery-item') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

posts.title: Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - leaderboard
posts.text: Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - leaderboard Newcomers enter steem, everything is so novel. The whole world of steem is vast and vast. The newcomer is like a little deer who crashed into a tall building. He is ignorant.He doesnâ€™t know how to get started. Facing the unknown world, we can follow the footsteps of our predecessors and move forward slowly! The first tool recommended is the leaderboard, find the objects you learn through the leaderboard, study how they grow up in steem, what they are doing and how to do it. Imagine the path of their growth and find your own way! 1.Steemitboard-ranking Website: https://steemitboard.com/ranking/index.php The leaderboard provides 12 categories of ranking index, including Reputation, Posts, Comments, Replies, Upvotes, Payouts, Steem power,Followers, Following, Resteem, Resteemed.Click on any of the keywords in the header to arrange them in a new way (currently there is no reverse order, it is recommended to increase the reverse order or increase the bottom button to reach the last @steemitboard). ï¼ˆFigure 1ï¼‰Figure 1 is ranked by Reputation, first place @haejin, reputation 83.97. Oh, my god, maybe itâ€™s hard to get along for a lifetime. I want to see how the big whale grows up. Click on his name to go directly to his blog. You can follow him and visit his home at willâ€¦ (Figure 2)Figure 2 is ranked according to the number of posts. Currently ranked first in @jlkreiss, 30,816 posts have been published, and 7211 more than the second-place @cryptomonitor. Oh, my god, how did he do it, but his reputation is negative (-8.3). I went to his blog and lapped it. The latest update was three months ago. It seems that he gave up the account.He moved WordPressâ€™s feed to articles directly and then praised himself. Replied to his message and praised himself. Dozens of posts per hour for three months, so he got 30,000+ posts soon!For those friends who want to develop in Steem for a long time, it is necessary to be cautious in issuing posts. This friend can also be a bad guide to us.(Figure 3)Figure 3 is ranked according to the total amount of SP, the No.1 no suspense is @steemit, with SP34898168, an amazing number. Studying each personâ€™s SP also has a special purpose, which will be introduced in future articles. But remind everyone to see such a large fortune, donâ€™t be jealous. After you follow me, your SP will be accumulated more.2.arcange - post listWebsite: https://steemit.com/@arcange@arcange provides 2 categories and 1 steem statistic daily. The bloggers describe the entire tour record in considerable detail, and the details are deeply rooted in the hearts of the people. posts.title: Application for- Partiko Mentorship Program Round 2
posts.text: Hello, friends in the steem world. This is my application post for this round 2 mentor programme. Here is the official post created by @rosatravelshttps://steemit.com/steem/@rosatravels/partiko-mentorship-program-round-2-begins-earn-40-steem-cenmax8r There are more than50 DApps(Decentralized Applications) created on the Steem blockchain in the past year. The ecosystem of Steem is just so huge that more and more new ones are coming on the horizon each month. All of this is working towards the good of Steem. On top of that, many DApps are reaching out to new people via social media such as Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, Youtube, etc. With this, I can foresee an influx of newcomers coming onto Steem in 2019. Never had there been such intense development of DApps than in the past 6 months. More new DApps are coming on board in 2019.Although in the world of steem, I am also a newcomer. I am willing to share the experience and ideas I have accumulated during my growth. I will gradually write some posts on how to use the steem app to help everyone better and better adapt to the life of the steem world. I have written two articles on how to find people and find applications in the steem world. Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - APP leaderboard Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - leaderboardKindly review my application and consider me for this programme. I will try my best to mentor people to use @partiko app if I am given this opportunity. If you want to experience partiko now, please click to download! posts.title: Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - APP leaderboard
posts.text: Last week,I post Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - leaderboard I introduced three kinds of leaderboard: 1.Steemitboard-ranking Website: https://steemitboard.com/ranking/index.php 2.arcange - post list Website: https://steemit.com/@arcange 3.steeminsights - looking for someone in the same city Website: https://steeminsights.com These three lists make it easy for you to find the best in a certain type of account, such as the highest reputation, the most SP, the most upvotes of the article, and the big whale in the same city. Please read the article for specific usage. If you have a strong interest in an account or a big one, you can use the details of his account: https://steemworld.org. The specific method of use will be introduced in the future. Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - APP leaderboardEvery steemian comes from a different field, each of them is different from others, so everyoneâ€™s project or application of attention to steem is not the same. How to find your favorite projects in the steem application that blooms everywhere, and find your own friends who are like-minded on steem; how to find potential APP in new applications that pop up like a mushroom, so as to get ahead in new applications. how to make a discerning eye in the described investment projects, so that your limited SP will become a golden henâ€¦.To choose a good project, first you have a project option, the following I will recommend three APP leaderboards. 1.steemappswebsiteï¼šhttps://steemapps.com/ (Figure 1)As shown in Figure 1, the list provides application data rankings in three time frames, 24 hours, 7 days, and 30 days. Short-term rankings are suitable for applications that are just online, and long-term rankings are suitable for relatively stable applications.As shown in Figure 1, the list provides five sorting methods in different timeframes, such as active user rankings. The specific meanings of each indicator are as follows:USERS:DAU are unique users over a specific timeframe, who are either transferring to the app, creating custom_jsons of the app or creating posts/comments with the app. Important: The real number of users can be much higher with specific apps due to missing data, which weâ€™re not able to fetch.Transactions:Transactions are all actions users of an app make, that are recorded on the blockchain and which can be pinned to a specific app (posts, comments, incoming transfers & custom_jsons). Outgoing transfers from users as well as votes are not able to be pinned to a specific app.Volume steem:The volume is calculated from incoming transfers of all accounts from the specific app.Volume SBD:The volume is calculated from incoming transfers of all accounts from the specific app.Rewards steem:Rewards are benefactor- & curation-rewards an app generates.(Figure 2)(Figure 3)As shown in Figure 2 and Figure 3, the list also provides a ranking, and each fish or whale can explore new applications or applications that are acceptable to the public based on their own interests.2.steeminsightswebsiteï¼šhttps://steeminsights.comThis website is also introduced in Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - leaderboard . In that post, it was introduced his account leaderboard function, especially recommended to find someone in the same city. This time I recommend his app leaderboard.(Figure 4)As shown in Figure 4, selecting â€œappsâ€ switches from â€œaccountsâ€ to the application leaderboard, and its content and sorting are exactly the same as https://steemapps.com/ , except for time range. The purpose of the website is to bring together the two lists â€œaccountsâ€ and â€œappsâ€. At present, there seems to be no unique thing.3.steemprojectswebsiteï¼šhttps://steemprojects.com/This is the official entry of steem applications. There are two ways to enter. One is to click on the link to the above website.(Figure 5)(Figure 6)The second is to enter through the steemit homepage, as shown in Figure 5 and Figure 6. Click on the drop-down box to the right of the steemit home page and there will be a series of guides shown in Figure 6, one of which goes directly to steemprojects.(Figure 7)The main function of the website is shown in Figure 7. The functions of data analysis are far less comprehensive than that of steemapps, but there is a function for submitting personal development apps in the upper right corner.Finally, if you want to find other non-steem blockchain project application leaderboards recommended:1.https://dappradar.com/(Figure 8) 2.https://www.stateofthedapps.com/ (Figure 9)The specific use will not be repeated, personally feel that all types of blockchain application list DAPP radar is the originator.I am a newcomer to steem. The tools mentioned may not be the best. You are welcome to give any help to me.thanks. posts.title: Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - ROI leaderboard
posts.text: I wrote two articles last week about Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales. 1.Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - leaderboard This article introduces the method of finding big whale, you can find the highest reputation, the most posts or the most SP â€¦ 2.Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - APP leaderboard This article describes how to find a steem application. You can find the most profitable application for online usersâ€¦ Now lets introduce u the third: Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - ROI leaderboard SteemprofitWebsite: https://www.steemprofit.info/ The website tracks transfers to steem user @wefund (by default), who delegated SP to various steem services. It can be seen from the above chart that the last 16 days, ranked in the top of the income list are @tipu, @therising, @booster, the revenue is 16.62%, 14.88%, 14.69%, of course, the actual annual income will be higher, because this is In the simple interest model, in fact, the income of the agent can be reinvested every day, which is much higher than the book income. You can change the account name in the mark of â€œ1â€ above (steem is a decentralized platform, and the operation of each account is traceable), if you want to know the portfolio of the big whale. Just enter his account here. Itâ€™s amazing to think about it. If Buffett is also investing in steem, everyone can see his portfolio. You can change the period at the mark of â€œ2â€ in the above figure. If you want to know the income of a project with a longer term, click â€œLoad Moreâ€. The statistical revenue of this website is simply the return of the project party to the agent every day. In fact, the delegation income is much more complicated than this. Delegation revenue model 1. Simple daily income.The top of the income list, such as @tipu, @therising, @booster, belongs to this type, you delegate to him, he will pay you the next day. This kind of delegation is suitable for people who never post a blog and only make a simple investment. 2. Daily income + Upvotes.@justyy will upvote your posts every day based on the amount of your delegation, and will return the proceeds every day. 3. Upvotes +Resteem.@digital.mine will give you some different upvotes every day based on the amount of your delegation, and the daily articles you posted will be resteemed immediately. For details contact: DISCORD 4. Upvotes + Points.@partiko will give you a different valuable upvotes every day depending on the amount of your delegation, and you will have 20 double points every day. New users download using PARTIKO: Download 5. Upvotes + Token.@wherein will give you a different valuable upvotes every day according to the amount of your delegation, and you will have early bird token rewards. The above five types of agent income methods can be selected according to their own posting situation and personal preference. If you need investment advice, you can also leave a message. delegate toolHttps://steemyy.com/delegate-form/ Â  Â  å‰ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´å†™äº†ä¸¤ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ï¼š posts.title: Hello,world of steem,a new member from Changsha of China!
posts.text: Dear friends, itâ€™s been almost 2 months since I came to the world of steem. I havenâ€™t written a self-introduction post that is said to be very popular. Some people will downvote on the new comerâ€™s introduction post last week, so I havenâ€™t introduced myself. It is recommended to do a self-introduction in a beginner community for steem. I want to finish my homework seriously! I am from Changsha, Hunan Province of China . Changsha has a well-developed culture and entertainment industry. If you havenâ€™t been to Changsha, you can go to Orange Island, Yuelu Mountain, Martyrs Park, Meixi Lake and other places to play. You can go to the fire palace in the center of Changsha to experience the Stinky tofu.It has been two months since I became a steemian, but I still havenâ€™t found a few friends in Changsha. Maybe there is no supplement in your location information. I hope that I can find several Changsha compatriots through this self-introduction post.Letâ€™s communicate with each other.Learm about steemMaybe the way I approach Steemit will be different from most friends. More people are recommended by friends or media to join this new world. I joined the big family of steemit through actifit.Some friends may have heard of the â€œFun Stepâ€ application in China. At the beginning, I registered the APP with the help of a friend who is not very familiar to me. Maybe the friend is not too optimistic about the project, and there is no specific tutorial on how to play. As a result, when the APP is really hot, my account has not been able to continue because it has not been played for nearly a month. Seeing such a hot project, I couldnâ€™t participate, so I searched for new applications related to sports and digital coins, then found actifit, so I entered the world of steem.My lifeMotionA few years ago, I often participated in outdoor activities organized by local outdoor groups. On weekends, I would go to the nearest city or county to climb mountains. I remember that the most impressive one was to climb Lianyungang in Yueyang city. It was actually a veteran who organized an outdoor tour, but that time he took the wrong road. It was only more than 20 kilometers away. But he lead us to walk more than 30 kilometers away. We all were exhausted, specially there was a child under the age of 10 in the team. Every time you climb a mountain, enter the green world, and breathe clean air, you can sweep away the fatigue of working in the city for a long time. More like the river, in the hot summer, the same group of outdoor friends, along the cool stream, relax under the mottled tree shadowâ€¦TV seriesI like sci-fi, interesting TV series. I have been chasing â€œThe big bangâ€, â€œGreen arrowâ€, â€œThe 100â€, â€œCounterpartâ€, and last yearâ€™s â€œBodyguard.â€ Itâ€™s just sinking into steem now, the time for watching TV is greatly reduced, and I can only watch TV series on the way to and from the subway every day.GamesIn fact, taking me into the pit of digital coins is still a game,from â€œHeroes of Might and Magic IIâ€, â€œDiabloâ€ to â€œLegendâ€, â€œWorld of Warcraft â€œ ,to the current blockchain game. In the blockchain, mining is a game, and steem now has a mining game. During this time, I also got a test number to play.Pls leave a private chat if you want to play.MusicMy favorite music are folk songs and country. I like these singers, such as Elton John, Enya.Fantasy NovelsThe same time is getting less and less, only to see it occasionally. Basically only pick the finished novel. Favorite fantasy novels authors are Xuehong and Fangxiang.My jobState-owned bank staff. Work hard every day.Thoughts about steemI like to find some software that is convenient for life, and in the world of steem I will also share some good applications and money-making applications for everyone!Â I have sorted out three articles in this periodâ€™s steem experience, anyone are welcome to guide.Thanks.1.Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - leaderboardThis article introduces the method of finding big whale, you can find the highest reputation, the most posts or the most SP â€¦2.Essential tools for steem from small fish to big whales - APP leaderboardThis article describes how to find a steem application. posts.title: The gate of Hunan Normal University
posts.text: The three major universities in Hunan,Central South University, Hunan University, and Hunan Normal University all share a common feature. The campuses is open and there is no wall to isolate the entire school from the surrounding environment. Because there is no way to isolate it, there is an avenue through the campus. The three universities are built according to Yuelu Mountain. The Lushan Road passes through the campuses of the three universities. The library and gymnasium of the Hunan Normal University are another side of the road. The campus of Hunan University is divided into three blocks, the Central South University campus and the dormitory area is separate. So the campus gates of the three universities are not like the gate, but like a memorial arch! Lushan Road passes through the Normal University and goes south. The university gate was rebuilt near the Lushan Road. It used to be a slope. And there was a row of small shops. Now all the stores are demolished and a grand gate is built. A large open space next to the planting of flowers and trees has become a small park. Above the small park is the School of Journalism and Communication at the Hunan Normal University. The campus ofHunan Normal University continued to the Xiaoxiang Middle Road on the edge of the Xiangjiang River. posts.title: The environment of Hunan Normal University
posts.text: Hunan Normal University is located at the foot of Yuelu Mountain. Undoubtedly, the air quality is first-class, and the coverage of green plants in the school is also high. Flowers bloom everywhere . There is a beautiful campus in Hunan Normal University. æ¹–å—å¸ˆå¤§åè½åœ¨å²³éº“å±±è„šä¸‹ï¼Œæ— ç–‘ç©ºæ°”è´¨é‡æ˜¯ä¸€æµçš„ï¼Œæ ¡å†…ç»¿æ¤è¦†ç›–ç‡ä¹Ÿé«˜ã€‚åˆ°å¤„ç››å¼€çš„èŠ±å°±å¯ä»¥çŸ¥é“ï¼Œå¸ˆå¤§æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç¾ä¸½çš„æ ¡å›­ã€‚ Being a qualified college only flowers and trees is not enough. Much more College Students are studying in the renovated library. Although the gymnasium is old, the students who exercise are everywhere in the basketball and badminton court. In fact, the most fresh experience is the canteen of the Hunan Normal University. The first is a beautiful environment. The dining room seats on the 3rd floor are clean and comfortable, and the soothing light music continues to play. Secondly, there are a wide variety of dishes, at the same time the rice and fresh soup are free; the last is the novel pricing method. All foods, whether they are vegetarian or fruit, are all priced by weight. There are no more than 8 varieties in a plate, only 23 yuan. äº‹å®ä¸Šæœ€æœ‰æ–°é²œæ„Ÿçš„ä½“éªŒè¿˜æ˜¯å¸ˆå¤§çš„é£Ÿå ‚ã€‚é¦–å…ˆæ˜¯ä¼˜ç¾çš„ç¯å¢ƒï¼Œæ•´ä¸ª3æ¥¼é£Ÿå ‚åº§æ¤…å¹²å‡€èˆ’é€‚ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰èˆ’ç¼“çš„è½»éŸ³ä¹æŒç»­æ’­æ”¾ï¼›å…¶æ¬¡æ˜¯å“ç§ä¸°å¯Œï¼Œè¤ç´ å„ç±»èœè‚´ç³ç…æ»¡ç›®ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ç³•ç‚¹ã€æ°´æœï¼Œè€Œä¸”ç±³é¥­ã€ç¨€ç²¥å’Œé²œ æ±¤è¿˜æ˜¯å…è´¹çš„ï¼›æœ€åæ˜¯æ–°é¢–çš„è®¡ä»·æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰çš„é£Ÿç‰©æ— è®ºè¤ç´ è¿˜æ˜¯æ°´æœï¼Œä¸€å¾‹æŒ‰é‡é‡è®¡ä»·ï¼Œæ»¡æ»¡ä¸€ç›˜ä¸ä¸‹8ä¸ªå“ç§ï¼Œä¸€å…±æ‰23å…ƒã€‚ Â  Â  Â  Posted from my blog with SteemPress : http://cnstm.org/blog/2019/03/27/the-environment-of-hunan-normal-university/ This page is synchronized from the post: The environment of Hunan Normal University document.querySelectorAll('.not-gallery-item') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

posts.title: Some tips about Partiko Mentors(Partiko å¯¼å¸ˆä¹‹æ—…ï¼‰
posts.text: It has been nearly a month since I applied to become Partiko Mentors. Through this month, I am comfortable with the use of Partiko, but from the perspective of a Partiko Mentor, it is still not enough. There are three aspects of the harvest to be a Partiko Mentor. First, I can use the various functions of Partiko skillfully. Of course, the most used one is to watch the advertisement ^-^! The second is to guide four Steemit users, download and use Partiko. The third is to help Partiko plan a third anniversary celebration of Steem, and send points to users with special Partiko points. It took a month of hard work to bring 4 new users to Partiko. In the mainland of China, using Partiko must use VPN, that blocks some users. In addition, Partikoâ€™s invitation to send points is also difficult to get.Every time the invitation is successful, but I did not receive the invitation points, which also led to less enthusiasm to invite new users. Finally, I hope Partiko can also have a web version, and have its own VPN! In addition, the messaging chat function mentioned by @rosatravels, I did not find in the IOS version? picture resource pixabay ç”³è¯·æˆä¸ºPartiko Mentorså·²å°†è¿‘ä¸€ä¸ªæœˆã€‚åœ¨è¿™ä¸€ä¸ªæœˆä¸­é€šè¿‡ä¸æ–­æ‘¸ç´¢ï¼Œè‡ªå·±å¯¹ä½¿ç”¨Partiko åˆ°æ˜¯ç•…é€šæ— é˜»ã€å¾—å¿ƒåº”æ‰‹ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä»Partiko Mentorsçš„è§’åº¦æ¥è¯´ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯è¿œè¿œä¸å¤Ÿã€‚ è¿™ä¸€ä¸ªæœˆä»¥æ¥è§‰å¾—åšPartiko Mentorså–å¾—æˆç»©æœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªæ–¹é¢ï¼š ä¸€æ˜¯è‡ªå·±èƒ½ç†Ÿç»ƒä½¿ç”¨Partikoçš„å„é¡¹åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå½“ç„¶ä½¿ç”¨æœ€å¤šçš„æ˜¯çœ‹å¹¿å‘Š^-^! äºŒæ˜¯å¼•å¯¼å››ä½Steemitç”¨æˆ·ï¼Œä¸‹è½½ä½¿ç”¨äº†Partikoã€‚ ä¸‰æ˜¯å¸®Partikoç­–åˆ’äº†ä¸€èµ·Steemä¸‰å‘¨å¹´åº†ç”Ÿæ´»åŠ¨ï¼Œç»™æœ‰ç‰¹æ®ŠPartikoç§¯åˆ†ç”¨æˆ·é€ç§¯åˆ†ã€‚ é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªæœˆçš„åŠªåŠ›æ‰ä¸ºPartikoå¸¦æ¥4ä½æ–°ç”¨æˆ·ï¼Œç¡®å®æœ‰è¾±Partiko Mentorsçš„ç§°å·ã€‚ä¸ªäººè§‰å¾—æ¨å¹¿æ–°ç”¨æˆ·ä½¿ç”¨Partikoä¸»è¦è¿˜æ˜¯ç™»é™†é—®é¢˜ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸­å›½å¤§é™†ç™»é™†ä½¿ç”¨Partikoå¿…é¡»ä½¿ç”¨VPNï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é˜»æ‹¦äº†éƒ¨åˆ†ç”¨æˆ·ã€‚å¦å¤–ï¼ŒPartikoé‚€è¯·é€ç§¯åˆ†ä¹Ÿå¾ˆéš¾é€åˆ°ä½ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡é‚€è¯·æˆåŠŸäº†ï¼Œå´æ²¡æœ‰è·å¾—é‚€è¯·ç§¯åˆ†ï¼Œè¿™ä¹Ÿå¯¼è‡´ä¸»åŠ¨å»é‚€è¯·æ–°ç”¨æˆ·çš„çƒ­æƒ…å‡å°‘ã€‚ æœ€åï¼Œå¸Œæœ›Partikoä¹Ÿèƒ½æœ‰ç½‘é¡µç‰ˆï¼Œä¹Ÿèƒ½æœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„VPNï¼å¦å¤–ï¼Œ@rosatravelsæåˆ°çš„ messaging chatåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæˆ‘åœ¨IOSç‰ˆå¹¶æ²¡æœ‰å‘ç°ï¼Ÿ@partiko Posted from my blog with SteemPress : http://cnstm.org/blog/2019/04/17/some-tips-about-partiko-mentorspartiko-%e5%af%bc%e5%b8%88%e4%b9%8b%e6%97%85%ef%bc%89/ This page is synchronized from the post: Some tips about Partiko Mentors(Partiko å¯¼å¸ˆä¹‹æ—…ï¼‰ document.querySelectorAll('.not-gallery-item') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

Only one day, there were 9 items in the auction house. When you look closely at the attributes of each item, you will find that all equipment items are missing the same key attributes. Each piece of equipment has attack and defense, but it has no Durability. In my own package, in addition to showing the weaponâ€™s attack power,so do the Durability! If you donâ€™t see this attribute at the auction house, it will cause the purchaser to be unable to tell if the item is still durable and can be used normally. Therefore, it is recommended that the game developer must display the Durability of each piece of equipment when placing items on the auction house! At the same time, it is recommended that players do not purchase equipment items for the time being, because the equipment that is bought back may be no Durability.@bitpizza,@golden.future,@bobokyaw,@glory7,@ror.pay This page is synchronized from the post: â€˜ROR:Something about auction,Durabilityâ€™ document.querySelectorAll('.not-gallery-item') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

posts.title: ROR: Distance data between towns
posts.text: At present, ROR only opens maps of South Korea, with 11 towns. It is basically centered on Daejeon, radiating on all sides, and then connecting 11 small towns with Seoul, Yeongwon, Busan and Gwangju as transportation hubs.The distance between two adjacent cities is usually within 2:30 hours. The farthest distance should be from Samcheok to Jeju Island, which takes 12 hours.Below is a map to facilitate the calculation of the distance between cities. Generally, in the case of normal operation, there will be about 56 stones.Lost a lot! å¦‚ä½•æ“ä½œæ‰èƒ½ä½¿æ”¶ç›Šæœ€å¤§åŒ–ï¼Ÿåœ¨æˆ˜æ–—åœ°å›¾ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€é”®å…¨éƒ¨æ´¾å‘é›‡ä½£å…µï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸€é”®æ´¾å‘ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ‰€æœ‰çš„é›‡ä½£å…µå°±æ˜¯ä¸€èµ·å®Œæˆä¸€ä¸ªæˆ˜æ–—ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚æ‰€æœ‰é›‡ä½£å…µä¸€èµ·åšæˆ˜æ–—ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œä»»åŠ¡éš¾åº¦å¤§å¹…é™ä½ï¼Œè‡ªç„¶ä¹Ÿåªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ˜æ–—ä»»åŠ¡çš„æ”¶è·ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯è·å¾—çš„ç»éªŒä¸ä¼šå‡å°‘ï¼Œåªæ˜¯è·å¾—çš„èµ„æºå‡å°‘ã€‚ How can we maximize the benefits?In the battle map, you canâ€™t use a one button to distribute all mercenaries. If one button is distributed, all the mercenaries will complete a combat mission together. All mercenaries work together as combat missions, and the difficulty of the mission is greatly reduced. Naturally, there is only one battle mission. But the experience gained will not be reduced, only the resources obtained will be reduced. æ´¾å‘ä»»åŠ¡æ—¶ï¼Œé€‰ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªé›‡ä½£å…µåœ¨ç‚¹å‡»ä¸‹æ–¹çš„å¼€å§‹ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªä¸ªé€‰ã€ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ªæ´¾å‘ï¼Œç›´åˆ°ä½ æ‰€æœ‰çš„é›‡ä½£å…µæ´¾å‘å®Œæ¯•ã€‚ç„¶ååœ¨ä½ çš„ä»»åŠ¡æ¸…å•é‡Œï¼Œä¼šæœ‰å¤šä¸ªæœªå®Œæˆçš„ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚ è¯·æ³¨æ„ï¼Œåœ¨æˆ˜æ–—åœ°å›¾ä¸€å®šè¦æ ¹æ®è‡ªå·±é›‡ä½£å…µçš„å®åŠ›ï¼Œå°½é‡ç”¨æœ€å°‘çš„äººå‘˜ç»„åˆå»è·å¾—æœ€å¤§çš„æ”¶ç›Šï¼ When dispatching a mission, select a mercenary at the beginning of the click below, one by one, one by one, until all your mercenaries are distributed. posts.title: ROR: How to calculate experience value å¦‚ä½•è®¡ç®—æˆ˜æ–—åœ°å›¾è·å–ç»éªŒå€¼
posts.text: æ ¹æ®å¤šä¸ªæˆ˜æ–—åœ°å›¾çš„è§‚å¯Ÿï¼Œå‘ç°æˆ˜æ–—åœ°å›¾è·å–çš„ç»éªŒå€¼æ˜¯æœ‰è§„å¾‹çš„ã€‚ä¸ªäººè®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯ï¼šç»éªŒå€¼=æ€ªç‰©ä¸ªæ•°*æ€ªç‰©ç­‰çº§ã€‚è€Œä¸”ç›®å‰ä¸ç®¡æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé›‡ä½£å…µå®Œæˆä»»åŠ¡è¿˜æ˜¯å¤šä¸ªé›‡ä½£å…µä¸€èµ·å®Œæˆä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªé›‡ä½£å…µè·å–çš„ç»éªŒå€¼æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ã€‚ According to the observation of multiple battle maps, it is found that the experience value obtained from the battle map is regular. Personally think it is: experience value = number of monsters * monster level.And now, whether a mercenary completes a mission or multiple mercenaries complete a mission, each mercenary gains the same experience. å¦‚ï¼šBusançš„A basementï¼Œå®Œæˆä»»åŠ¡æ¯ä¸ªé›‡ä½£å…µè·å–çš„ç»éªŒå€¼ä¸º3*7=21ï¼Œ3ä¸ºæ€ªç‰©ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œ7ä¸ºæ€ªç‰©ç­‰çº§ã€‚ Such as: Busanâ€™s A basement, the completion of the task each mercenary gains the experience value of 3 * 7 = 21, 3 is the number of monsters, 7 is the monster level. å¦‚ï¼šGaeseongçš„Waster landï¼Œå®Œæˆä»»åŠ¡æ¯ä¸ªé›‡ä½£å…µè·å–çš„ç»éªŒå€¼ä¸º7*3=21ï¼Œ7ä¸ºæ€ªç‰©ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œ3ä¸ºæ€ªç‰©ç­‰çº§ã€‚ Such as: Gaeseongâ€™s Waster land, the completion of the task each mercenary gained an experience value of 7 * 3 = 21, 7 is the number of monsters, 3 is the monster level. Gaeseongçš„Waster landè·å–ç»éªŒå€¼æœªè‡´å®åœ°éªŒè¯ï¼ˆå› ä¸ºä¸ªäººè®¤ä¸ºè¿™ä¸ªåœ°å›¾åŒBusançš„A basementçš„ç›¸æ¯”ï¼Œç›®å‰ä¸åˆç®—ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸€ç›´æ²¡å»è¿‡ï¼‰ã€‚å¦‚æœ‰ä¸ç¬¦ï¼Œè¯·æŒ‡æ­£ï¼å¦‚äºäº‹å®ç›¸ç¬¦ï¼Œä¹Ÿè¯·ä¿®æ”¹è¯¥åœ°å›¾çš„æ€ªç‰©ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œèƒ½æé«˜å®Œæˆè¯¥åœ°å›¾è·å–çš„ç»éªŒå€¼ã€‚ Gaeseongâ€™s Waster land acquisition experience value has not been verified (because personally think that this map is not worthwhile compared to Busanâ€™s A basement, so I have not been visited it till now).If there is any discrepancy, please correct me!If the facts match, ROR developers should modify the number of monsters on the map to improve the experience gained by completing the map.@bitpizza,@golden.future,@bobokyaw,@glory7,@ror.pay This page is synchronized from the post: â€˜ROR: How to calculate experience value å¦‚ä½•è®¡ç®—æˆ˜æ–—åœ°å›¾è·å–ç»éªŒå€¼â€™ document.querySelectorAll('.not-gallery-item') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

posts.title: ROR:what are you doing in ROR?
posts.text: The mercenaries which I had spent months were unable to continue fighting because their lives had expired. Donâ€™t know what the players feel like? What do the game developers think? I have invested more time in ROR. I wanted to continuously upgrade my ordinary mercenaries untill they reached level 10. They will be upgraded to senior mercenaries according to the design of the game developers. However, after I have tried this for a long time, it was found that in the current situation ordinary mercenaries canâ€™t be reached level 10 by upgrading. Normal mercenaries need 7776 experience points to upgrade to level 7, and 16807 experience points to upgrade to level 8. Because my highest mercenary is still only level 7, it is not clear how much experience you need to upgrade to levels 9 and 10, but it is guessed that level 9 requires at least 32,000 and level 10 requires at least 64,000. At present, the most effective and sustainable upgrade method is to fight with thief at the A basement of BUSAN, and get 21 points of experience per hour. If a player is loyal to ROR and persists in fighting 8 times a day, then he can get 168 experience points per day, only 16800 experience points in 100 days, and can barely reach level 8. However, it is difficult to find that the lifespan of a typical mercenary is less than 100 days, let alone to reach level 10, at least 64,000 experience points are required. In the current maps, it takes 400 days to reach level 10. If loyal players can upgrade to high-level mercenaries through ordinary mercenaries, either extend the life of the mercenaries or develop efficient maps. Friends who are still playing, what are you doing in ROR? @golden.future@ror.pay@roadofrich@glory7 This page is synchronized from the post: â€˜ROR:what are you doing in ROR?â€™ document.querySelectorAll('.not-gallery-item') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

posts.title: ROR:Mercenary life system
posts.text: After reflecting the issue of the lifetime of mercenaries, the game developers paid much attention to it, and released a message on December 10 stating thatï¼šWe are rechecking the mercenary life system.Mercenary life systems can be removed or changed to other systems. Upvote the developerâ€™s response first! Mercenaries have a lifetime, it is the first time that I have encountered in countless games I played. This idea is very creative. But whether it can be used well depends on the supporting post-development. I think this life span is better to keep, after all, it is a very new idea for the game team. I do nâ€™t know if the game player can add a map with relatively high level requirements in the subsequent development. Where the players can get some items that extend the lifetime. For example, after using 10 of the items, mercenary can extend the life by 1 week. Advanced items can extend life for one month after use. If the player does not receive the drug for a long time, the mercenary will naturally expire and die. @golden.future@ror.pay@roadofrich@glory7 This page is synchronized from the post: â€˜ROR:Mercenary life systemâ€™ document.querySelectorAll('.not-gallery-item') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });
